name: Swarovski Rhinestone Running Horse T Shirt
description: Run free wearing this beautiful Mustang horse designed with hundreds of Swarovski Rhinestone Crystals. Available on a black ladies scoop neck, short sleeve t-shirt. These are 100% cotton shirts that are stretchy but do run small. Order a size up for a looser fit. No special washing instructions are required. It is recommended to turn inside out before washing. Customized colors and different t-shirt styles are available at our website  www.ruthiesrhinestones.com
